lines.text:
[Possessed]
I told you, you'd have to leave.
You want to destroy, this boy's life?
I do, what I want.
You must leave, this boy's body, which you are followed presence occupies.
Why should I, leave? I like it, here.
I will, cast you out.
Oh. How?
With, an exorcism.
You can't, do that you're not, authorized.
How do you know?
We know, everything.
Is it you're intention, not to show yourself again?
I could.
When?
When, I please!
[Father Adamsky, gets up and leaves Sonny's cell]

[at the Montelli trial]
... Your Honor, it is my intention to prove that Sonny Montelli is a victim of demonic possession - that is, possession by the Devil - and therefore innocent of the charges placed against him.

Mr. Booth, I admire your originality. If I accept your plea, regardless of verdict, every courtroom in this country would be inundated with pleas of demonic possession. Nobody would be guilty of anything anymore. Quite literally, "The Devil made me do it." You have three days to submit another plea, Mr. Booth.
[last lines]
Blessed Lord, Lord of my life, do not forsake me!

[through Sonny's cassette player]
Why didn't you pull the trigger? Why didn't you shoot that pig?

[Painted on Jan and Mark's wall]
Dishonor, thy father. Pigs!
You put the fork here, stupid.
Shut Up!
[Threatening Jan, with a fork]
Don't tell me, to shut up.

[Anthony removes his belt, from his pants]
Anthony, You can't do that. You can't do that, to the kids, no.

[Looking terrified]
But daddy, it was the brushes, we didn't do it!
Mark, you think, that's funny, huh?
[Smacks him with the belt]

[Mark and Jan, running away screaming]
WHAT ARE YOU DOING, HE CAN'T EVEN WRITE?
What about her?
DON'T TOUCH HER, DON'T YOU TOUCH HER!
YOU FUCKIN' CUNT, YOU RUINED THIS HOUSE, GET OUTTA MY WAY!
YOU LEAVE HER ALONE!
[Anthony, smacks her, and storms out of the kids room]
Kill you, I'll kill you, you...
[Growls in frustration]

[Yelling at Jan]
Where's your sister? You had somethin', to do with this?
[Delores, slashes his face, to prevent him from doing further damage]
NO!
You stop It!
That's funny?
[Hitting Delores, with the belt]
You think that's funny?
[Continues, belting Delores]
That's Funny?
You're a big man! Don't you hit 'em!
JESUS H. CHRIST! WHAT DO YOU KIDS THINK THIS IS... A PLAYGROUND?

[crying]
We didn't do it! We didn't do it!
DON'T YOU LIE TO ME!
[he slaps Jan]
Please, don't hit the child.
Mister, this is none of your business! You hear that? I raise my children the way I see fit! Go do what you got to do, then go!

[Possessed]
You decided, to do this on your own. Without the support, of the church. You're disobeying, the church. Now, you're alone, Adamsky
What's that?
This is, a surplice.
Oh.
Oh, I bet you know, what this is, though?
I've seen it but, I don't know the name.
It's, a stole.
Oh.

[putting a plastic bag, over Mark's head]
You're dead! You're dead.
You're scaring me, I can't breathe!
It's like, a movie.
[removes the bag from Mark's head]
Don't worry, it's okay. Here, you can give the glass.
[kisses Mark]
I love you.
I think Mommy doesn't want to make love to Daddy anymore. I think he tries to force her.
They're mine. My panties.
I took them from the laundry.
